focus_spells.name: Inspire Courage
focus_spells.description: You inspire your allies with words or tunes of encouragement. You and all allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

focus_spells.name: Counter Performance
focus_spells.trigger: You or an ally within 60 feet would be affected by an auditory or visual effect.
focus_spells.description: You use your performance to counter a sonic or visual effect. Roll a Performance check; if your performance is instrumental, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus against auditory effects, and if your performance is a visual display, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus against visual effects. You can counter both types with a combination performance, but you don't gain a circumstance bonus.

feats.name: Leshy Superstition
feats.description: You've learned to be wary of magic from your elders. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells and magical effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, you get a critical success instead.

feats.name: Lingering Composition
feats.description: By adding flourishes and refrains, you make your compositions last longer. If your next action is to cast a cantrip composition with a duration of 1 round, the composition lasts 2 rounds instead.

feats.name: Reach Spell
feats.description: You can extend the range of your spells. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that has a range, increase that spell's range by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, you extend its range to 30 feet.

inventory.name: Resonant Mandolin
inventory.description: Serves as a spellcasting focus and performance instrument

inventory.name: Adventurer's Pack
inventory.description: Includes backpack, bedroll, 10 pieces of chalk, flint and steel, 50 feet of rope, 2 weeks' rations, soap, 5 torches, and a waterskin

notes.title: Performance at the Whispering Oak
notes.content: My melody moved the ancient tree spirits tonight. The locals said they've never seen the luminescent leaves dance so brightly. Must remember to incorporate more wind-like tones next time for a stronger response.

notes.title: New Composition Ideas
notes.content: Been experimenting with mimicking the sounds of morning dew falling from leaves in my music. The resonance creates an unexpected calming effect that might be useful for our next forest exploration.

spells.name: Daze
spells.description: You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals 1d6 mental damage; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also stunned 1.

spells.name: Forbidding Ward
spells.duration: Until the start of your next turn
spells.description: You ward an ally against the attacks and hostile spells from the target enemy. The target ally gains a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the target enemy's attacks, spells, and other effects.

spells.name: Guidance
spells.duration: Until the start of your next turn
spells.description: You provide divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

spells.name: Shield
spells.duration: Until the start of your next turn
spells.description: You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use. While the spell is in effect, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your magical shield.

spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.description: You temporarily animate a corpse to fight for you. The corpse becomes a mindless undead creature. If the corpse was previously animated, you can instead extend the duration of your control over it for the duration of this spell. The animated corpse acts on your next turn and has 4 actions each turn that it remains animated.

spells.name: Bless
spells.description: Blessings from beyond help your allies strike true. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls while within the emanation. The first time each round a new ally enters the area, the spell's emanation increases by 5 feet.

spells.name: Fear
spells.description: You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save. On a critical success, the target is unaffected. On a success, the target is frightened 1. On a failure, the target is frightened 2. On a critical failure, the target is frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 round.

heightened.3rd: You can target up to five creatures.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: You send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, you can fire an additional missile at the same or a different target.

heightened.+2: You fire one additional missile with each action you spend.

spells.name: Charitable Urge
spells.description: You implant a charitable urge in the target's mind. The target must attempt a Will save. If the target has no action or reaction available when it fails its save, it is affected for an equal amount of time after it regains actions.

spells.name: Noise Blast
spells.description: A scintillating array of sounds tears through the minds of your enemies. Targets must attempt a Fortitude save and take 2d8 sonic damage. On a critical success, they are unaffected. On a success, they take half damage. On a failure, they take full damage and are deafened for 1 round. On a critical failure, they take double damage and are deafened for 4 rounds.
